## AnimatedExtrusionHandler.(constructor)

Creates an \[\[AnimatedExtrusionHandler\]\] in \[\[MapView\]\].

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
constructor(m_mapView: MapView);
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  m\_mapView | [MapView](./harp-mapview.mapview.md) | Instance of \[\[MapView\]\] that passes <code>zoomLevel</code> through the <code>zoom</code> property update |
